title: I keep getting error code 004 when I try to log in.
body: When ever I try to log  in to play the game, I keep getting a message saying "Patching failed an we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again". I have restarted the client 5 times now and am still getting the message. I am wondering if this is somehow my fault or just a bug. Thanks for any responses.

replies.body: That 004 error is a pretty good sign that your OS doesn't have the correct permissions in place to let League run correctly. Without those settings, your OS can think League isn't recognized and shuts it down before it has a chance to load. Follow the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if you're not sure how to adjust your permissions, and you'll be back on the Rift in no time.
